insert into t_sales_order (customer, so_no, contract_code, distribution_type, pay_type, send_warehouse, sender, sender_phone, send_area, send_address, send_time, pack_require, receiver, receiver_phone, receive_area, receive_address, create_time) values (#{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{soNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributionType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendWarehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{packRequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_sales_order set customer = #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, so_no = #{soNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distribution_type = #{distributionType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_warehouse = #{sendWarehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender = #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender_phone = #{senderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_area = #{sendArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_address = #{sendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pack_require = #{packRequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_area = #{receiveArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_address = #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where so_id = #{soId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select so_id, customer, so_no, contract_code, distribution_type, pay_type, send_warehouse, sender, sender_phone, send_area, send_address, send_time, pack_require, receiver, receiver_phone, receive_area, receive_address, create_time from t_sales_order where so_id = #{soId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
